类型: Size: XX-LargeColor: S Print Rose Multicolored
评论详情: I purchased an XXL based on reviews and should have sized down for a more tapered waist look. For reference I am 5’3 and currently 200lbs. I am very curvy with an ample booty and 36H bra size. The con in getting the XXL is the waist was not tapered and I don’t have a large waist line or “Mommy Pouch”. A XL would have given me a better look. Even though it wasn’t as tapered as I would have liked it was still beautiful. The colors were very vibrant against my dark brown skin tone. The back is out but I wore a red bra so it blended with the dress. The front fit well without being too big. Someone suggested bra or clothing tape. I did not need it at all. If you have smaller cup size such as a DD or smaller and you need a XXL then the front may need to be held with a pin or broach. The length was perfect for me and if it was a bit shorter I would have been fine with it. I wore 3 1/2 inch red sandals. I am at my heaviest weight and plan to drop down in size in the next couple of months. I will repurchase in a size L and M to determine which fits better. I am going in a cruise and would like to wear this dress. I will gift this to someone else in the family.

I didn’t expect this dress to fit so perfectly and look so adorable!  I bought the light blue floral pattern in XS.  I am 5’6” and weigh 132 lb- fits perfectly.  I don’t normally buy XS, but I read another review, and decided to get one size smaller than I usually order.  It worked!  will order another color I think!

Great transition dress. Super cute & comfy. Can be worn with boots, sandals, or sneakers. Well made. Lined & not scratchy. Wore in Vegas on a cool night with boots. For reference I’m 5’4, 125 lbs. and small fit great.
Fit perfectly and so comfortable!

I originally purchased this dress for a bridal shower. I got the sage green color in size S and I am 130 lb 5'5 for reference. I was debating if I wanted to wear this or not due to the lack of support in the chest area. The way the dress dips into a deep V makes it a little challenging to wear a regular bra. I also want to note that the S was too big on me and I probably needed to size down to an XS so that had an impact on the tightness of the top part. It was super cute on, I will say but the only issue was that I felt a little too exposed in the chest area for a bridal shower. Maybe if I had a smaller size, it would have fit a little better in that area but I didn't have enough time to order a new one unfortunately. Very cute dress though, I would consider ordering a smaller size next time I had an event coming up.

I’m absolutely obsessed with the Dokotoo Women’s Deep V Neck Dress! This dress has quickly become my go-to for every occasion, and I can’t count the number of compliments I’ve received when I wear it. The deep V-neck and backless design give it a stunning, elegant flair, while the ruffle details add a playful touch. I loved it so much that I ended up buying it in multiple colors! It’s incredibly versatile—perfect for everything from work to weddings. I can easily dress it up with heels or keep it casual with flats, making it suitable for any event. The flowy fabric is super comfortable, and I always feel fabulous in it. Just a heads up—if you don’t have boobs bigger than a C cup, this might not fit as well. If you’re looking for a dress that combines style and comfort, this is definitely the one!

评论概述: Beautiful dress! ...but only if you aren't sent a cheap one?
评论详情: Short version: I love the dress! It's so lovely and fits great. Can't wait to wear it! Wouldn't mind ordering other colors in the future :)  Long version: I ordered this dress 3 times. I got it in 2 sizes to figure out which one fit best (L and XL). Had I not done that, I wouldn't have noticed that I was sent one good quality dress and one possibe knock off? If you check out the video I attached you'll see what I mean. The cheap one in size L has a more faded fabric, no lining on the back of the top, no elastic on the waist, and the seams on the shoulders, neckline, zipper, and along the sides of the skirt were crooked. It fit terribly. I only tried ordering again because the bigger size was was much nicer quality and fit better even though it was way too large. I made sure to order another before sending the poor quality one back, to make sure I wasn't just sent the bad one again. 3rd one in size L was the same good quality as the XL and fit great! So overall happy, but not thrilled I had to order it 3 times to figure that out.

Overall, I like this dress a lot! It’s very cute, the fabric pattern (how the maker cut out the panels to make the dress) is really flattering! It looks cute, even though I’m a bigger girl and am super self-conscious. Thankfully, it covers my butt! Which is a rare thing in searching for dresses for me and other women who have more junk in the trunk. It also has white panels under the fabric, making it not see-through at the parts of your body you don’t want anyone seeing. I can wear a cami under this dress if I don’t want the cleavage and open back. I like that this dress is super light and frilly, especially where I live. I live in a dry hot climate that makes 100 degrees F the daily low in summer. The lightness of the material makes it really easy to wear in the summer. Now, let’s get to a few cons. The zipper on the back is kind of flimsy, so be careful when zipping and unzipping yourself from the dress. The cut also is lower in the front and higher in the back for junk-in-the-trunk women like myself, which makes me think that if the seller made alternations to the dress size range by adding plus sizes and making alterations to the making of the dresses for the new sizes, they would reach a higher market and women like myself would love to buy from them continuously. However, that’s just my opinion. I am on a weight loss journey and will likely lose weight, making the dress fit better and provide more coverage. I want to purchase the spaghetti-strap version because I like this dress so much and want a more everyday dress.

My 14yo Freshman daughter is very modest but wanted a dress to go with her School HOCO theme of "Love Island". We ordered 3 dresses, which were all very cute but this one was the winner because it looked really pretty and elegant/stylish and she was able to wear a tank top with the V neck shape of the dress without it looking "off" or "out of place". The waist had a beautiful detail ruffle which highlighted her figure and the sleeves are sheer so this dress offered coverage for the Fall weather and her modest nature but also had a light feel to fit in with the theme. She was very happy with the dress and the price point is completely worth it! She can also wear this dress on other occasions (I might even have to borrow it!). BEST PART???....she felt beautiful and confident, I mean....look at her beautiful face/smile.

评论概述: Super cute, but had to use a clip to keep a little modesty.
评论详情: I wore for my baby shower.  Quality and look of dress made sense for price.  It looked great, flow, beautiful! I did have to use a clip to closer the opening a little because it was just too revealing, but looked great nonetheless.

I ordered this dress in a Medium. I am 5ft 6in, 145 lbs and DDD bra. This is a beautiful flowing dress that’s perfect for a summer or spring event. I am top heavy so I also purchased the Vinperfor Low Back Bra on Amazon so that I could have support as well as no bra lines showing in the back of the dress. I wore this to my mom’s milestone birthday celebration and felt pretty all day :-) I just ordered the brown/black version of this dress in Large. I wanted to try a larger size to see if it made any difference in the hang of the dress or how the back fits. The large gave me more room in the waist, which I did not need and don’t necessarily like. It did not provide more space in the breast area or the back, which I did not need but would not have minded at all. Overall this is a girly fun whimsical dress and I am happy with both of my purchases.

评论概述: Exactly as pictured, but had to adjust neckline
评论详情: I knew when I bought this dress that the neckline was going to be plunging and I'd have to make a small sewing adjustment - which I ended up doing (sewed up about 1 inch from bottom of v-neck). Not very stretchy material but I think I could have sized down from S to XS as the waist area was a little looser on me. Usually I'm a US size S.  5 stars because the color, fit, fabric, and lining was exactly as expected. Not see-through at all. Since it is polyester you should expect it to be a little less breathable than natural fibers, and I also found that it clung to my body a little bit from static and/or sweat. I've worn it maybe 10 times already and put it through the wash and line dried each time - still looks new!

类型: Size: X-LargeColor: S Print Rose Multicolored
评论详情: Y’all, so I usually don’t write reviews but I figured I’d take the time to mention that this dress is one of my favorites. Before trying it on I had already read the reviews and ordered some boob tape prior to me wearing it out. If you are a plus size girl like myself, I would suggest to order up 1 size if you’re busty or have broad shoulders like myself. I usually wear an XL, but will be ordering this and a 2XL. I received so many compliments in this dress and having the back out also made me feel even more sexier. I would’ve given this dress a 5 out of 5, but due to the size running a little bit smaller it receives a 4 out of 5 in my opinion.  After wearing this for a while, the material near the breast area began to unravel, please keep this in mind if you want to keep this dress, long-term.

5’6, roughly 138lbs, and more athletic build, ordered small. Very cute dress and love the color and pattern. However, the middle section looks like I’m a three layer cake… I was expecting it to be more loose fit in that area so it sits like the photo but it doesn’t. Maybe if I sized up but I think the dress would feel way too big if I did that. Not for me but cute for others!
the cut is low in the front but the pattern is beautiful

I absolutely loved this dress! The fit was great and material wasn’t cheaply made. The color was just like the picture. Unfortunately I had to return due to choosing another dress from Amazon for baby shower

评论概述: for bigger curvy girls, it’s a no.
类型: Size: XX-LargeColor: S Print Rose Multicolored
评论详情: fit great except i didn’t notice the cutout in the back when i purchased. not even considering my “rolls”… where it is open, that where my bra strap hits. so nice to have cute things for bigger girls, but now let’s cover some of this up, people!
It’s comfortable to wear and very flattering. I ordered the wrong size but other than that it’s a beautiful dress and looks elegant. The material looks really nice and photographs well.
Love it

This is flattering for the girlies with a small chest. With a larger chest it gapped in the front, no leaning over allowed. And you have to go braless and it has no built in cups. Cute though! I had to safety on the front and wear a jacket.

I bought this dress for weekend wear and special occasions between Spring, Summer, and Fall.  I usually wear a size 12 in dresses, and ordered the Large.  The fit and the look of the dress is flattering, especially with the frilly look and the fitted waist in the bodice which accentuates my figure well.  I love the color of it with the soft medium blue and the little animal print pattern on it, it has a 60s/70s boho feel as well as a nod to the 80s with the animal print.  It really boosts my confidence wearing it.  I typically don't wear backless dresses, and it's a bold move for me, and I'm glad I took the plunge.  Very flattering dress on me.  It's feminine and flirty. :)The thing that can be difficult is buttoning the buttons from the back, it takes practice to get them secured properly, but thankfully the loops are stretchy enough that it allows the buttons to secure easier.  I'm a little less well-endowed on top, so I originally ordered a backless convertable pushup bra, and unfortunately the wing straps are still visible from the garment, so I will have to be like a hippie in 1969 and go braless or sew in cups, but it still looks great on me even when I'm a little thinner/unpadded with the girls.  It does fit a little snug in the waist part after I zipper the waist part, but it feels secure.  My husband likes the dress on me though, so it will be a date night fixture, even if it's a stay at home event due to Covid.  :)
This dress was perfect for a summer wedding and has the cutest cut out back for extra detail!
Bought this for a wedding and found myself wearing it more than once for different occasions. Super nice inner lining. Fits a little big but otherwise very cute.
This dress is so beautiful. Perfect for spring! The sizing was a bit off but it was still so gorgeous and the quality was absolutely amazing which i was a tiny bit surprised about!

I get so many compliments on this outfit! It looks so great with a fun platform or sandal. If you are tall, you could get away with wearing a tight white jean. It is such great quality, thick, but very breathable. There are no zippers so you don’t have to worry about it getting caught or stuck. I really love this dress.
but had to return because front is to open for my style

Dress looks really cute irl, but doesn’t photograph super flattering. This is a me issue, not the dress. I ended up adding a button to raise the neckline by 2 inches because I couldn’t find something to match well underneath and it looked weird without anything.  3 stars because the fabric is very fragile and started tearing out of the stitching before I even wore out the day after it came in. I was able to sew it back and secure it, but not ideal.

类型: Size: MediumColor: S New Pink Floral
评论详情: This is a pretty dress but the medium fit like a large. Size down if you’re in between!

I wore this for my 11th anniversary in a nice fancy place! Wore it in Texas around 6:30pm-10pm in June, 90degree heat, but didn’t really feel bothered as the material is light weight. There is a zipper and I feel it was tight around my chest/lower back, but every where else felt the right size. I did use boob tape but I felt thru out the night the top was getting loose. I kept pulling the top of the dress back or else I might have had a dress malfunction 😅 the dress came with the seams tore in a few places. Though, I got a lot of compliments and I paired it with orange accessories 😍
I would definitely size down on this dress. I think it’s very pretty but it makes me look wide for some reason. I’m petite so that should say enough.

I absolutely LOVE this dress. It looks exactly as pictured and was easy to put on. The sleeves and skirt are super flowy and lightweight without feeling cheap. The body and skirt were not see-through. My only complaint would be that I found the neck to be too deep cut for me, but nothing that a safety pin couldn't fix.

I was worried about the cut being so low but it worked well. I just wore some pasties just in case. Fashion tap would have been good to make sure nothing showed in the bust but it was okay with out it. I got so many compliments on it. I usually wear a medium or a small if it runs large but the medium was okay, just a smidge too loose in the bodice area but a small would have been too small for my long arms and long legs. The back has a sizable cut-out but wasn't too low. Don't think you would want to wear a bra with a back with this dress though or it will show. I was in a pinch and needed a dress. This was great as it arrived quickly (even though most of the time Amazon is a day or two later than expected in my area) and was not expensive. Over all solid dress.

类型: Size: X-LargeColor: S Print Rose Multicolored
评论详情: I love this dress! I bought it as a different sort of nightdress to wear with my boyfriend, or maybe to wear with leggings, but not to wear out, because I am way past the days where I want to go out in a backless dress. Luckily it's not that short (I'm just under 5'5" and it comes down to the top of my knees) and if you don't mind showing off plenty of skin, it's a gorgeous summer dress!  I love the cut, and LOVE the fabric, a soft chiffon. But it's a bit tricky to put on yourself, and it's hard to get the zipper in back up all the way--might be the awkward angle, but probably should have sized up. It's a just a bit snug in the bodice but fits well around the hips (I'm usually an XL in pants).

First of all, this dress is absolutely gorgeous. The material is nice, it’s flattering & comfortable. The only thing I struggled with is how incredibly short it is. I got an XL & I’m only 5’3 so definitely not a tall girl but I couldn’t take two steps without my but cheeks showing. Tbf the dress wasn’t too short in the front & that model was very flat so if you have any type of booty size up if you can. I couldn’t because XL was the biggest & I thought I’d be okay because I honestly have no problem showing skin, but I draw the line at showing cheeks lol. Had to wear shorts & only ended up wearing it for pictures since it wasn’t functional :/

I ordered ten dresses from Amazon and tried on no less than 25 at various stores looking for a dress that I wanted to wear for engagement photos. I wanted something with sleeves but still spring/summer appropriate and really wanted light blue or green. This dress 100% fit the bill. It is light, the sleeves are billowy, and it’s long enough to still do spins and not be worried about the world seeing what under your dress. It is also very flattering and the movement is amazing in photos. The back is SO cute with buttons and open but you really can’t wear a bra or shape wear at all. Couple of notes: I didn’t like the ruffles on the sleeves so I just tucked them under and they stayed put. The v neck is very low, I couldn’t not wear a bra so had to do boob tape but honestly it’s one of my favorite things about the dress. It ended up being the perfect dress for me for photos. I wear a 34B and typically wear a M or L and ordered a large. I couldn’t have been happier with this dress.

类型: Size: MediumColor: S Print Blue Floral
评论详情: I ordered this dress for a wedding guest option. I absolutely love this dress. Looks identical to the photo described, very pretty! I ordered a medium, I’m 145 pounds, smaller chest. I could have done a small but medium was good! Highly recommend.

评论概述: Excellent quality and fit beautiful design
评论详情: Amazed at the quality and feel and fit of this dress. I was hesitant on the sizing but I need it right away for my grandmothers 90th birthday in Arizona. It is lightweight with long sleeves perfect for the 70’s weather there right now. I’m 5’2” 160 34/36DD and always wear a large but the medium was only available for fast next day shipping and I took a chance and omg!!! It fits perfectly, it is the perfect fit of a size 8 dress. It is not too short above the knee just perfect. The v cut fit just right with the comfortable coverage no bra needed it is backless and it provides coverage and support. This is a lovely dress and I will most definitely get it In different colors. It is well worth the price. I highly Recommend it for this summer and spring and fall. It is a beautiful well executed design. Love love love this dress!!!

类型: Size: XX-LargeColor: S New Pink Floral 2
评论详情: I got this dress for a trip to Nashville and not only did I love it- dozens of women stopped me on the street to compliment it! It’s incredibly comfortable and breezy while looking chic too. The back has three buttons to secure the top and I did pop one of those off but it was an easy sewing fix, the other two are super secure. A must buy dress.

类型: Size: LargeColor: S Print Blue Floral
评论详情: I really like this dress 👗. So I ordered according to size chart. When it came beautiful but way to big. Sent back with disappointment 😞.

This was a beautiful dress that I bought for graduation and pictures. I am wearing an XL, i may have been able to wear a L but I was worried it would have been too tight around my waist/bust. This dress doesn’t stretch but it is beautiful. I have a 4 star only because it required me to have to buy lots of boob tape and fabric tape which worked amazing to keep the top in place and not show too much cleavage. Overall it’s a great dress !! Buy it, you’ll look and feel great!

I got this for my brother in laws wedding and it was so comfy! I used tape instead of a bra and it worked great. It was an outdoor wedding in June and I wasn't too hot, very light! Fits true to size and the color was the exact same as the picture. Great purchase! I got so many compliments!

I absolutely loved wearing this dress to a friend’s birthday redo where he asked guests to wear shades of blue! It was my first real outing since the pandemic so I was eager to get out, feel pretty and have a good time! It was a last minute change because I didn’t like what I ordered elsewhere and with less than a week until the event this outfit came right away! I received multiple compliments and some much appreciated male attention lol! I am 5’2”, 180 and 36DD - I’m wearing a size Large. I would recommend body tape in place of a bra and wig tape to hold the dress in place on your chest. Find YouTube videos on how best to tape yourself and don’t do it in a rush lol. I used TK tape because that’s all I could find on short notice in stores. It held all night and I felt confident the girls would NOT make an unwanted appearance LOL. There is no stretch in the dress material, it’s sheer but the built in slip covers the front panels and the skirt all around. I felt so beautiful that I didn’t care about my back fat. Maybe I’ll do a tape lift next time. This was one of my fave picks! I paired with nude shoes and purse but I’d love to play it up with blue heels! Get it, you won’t be disappointed!

For reference, I am 6’0, 190 lbs. I originally ordered the light green in a L, but it was slightly too small, so I ordered an XL. The dress itself is beautiful, but I received my second order with no zipper so I will be returning it :(  I am a 36DD, and the neckline was a little low, but nothing a safety pin can’t fix :)

It is sexy, no lie. If you want to wear it around your conservative family or to church, look elsewhere. Otherwise, put in your cart and purchase. I'm 5'5", about 220 pounds, usually wear 14/16, and I bought an XL. It fits like a dream. My fiance immediately loved it. ;) Your boobs will be breasting boobily. Your back is out and you can't wear a bra. Don't fret. My boobs are definitely not up where they used to be and I don't plan to wear a bra with this. I just tucked them up in the dress where I want them to go and they're good! I got pretty active in it and they didn't come out so... If you're still concerned with them dangling, you may need breast tape, but we've come a long way with that stuff and it's not the duct tape drag queens were forced to use in the 80s anymore. Just buy some, it's cheap. I will be recommending this dress to everyone who compliments me on it when they inevitably compliment me on it because honey, I look good in it. You will too.

Great dress! No rips or tears. It hugs my waist very well. Unfortunately, I am an A cup, so it is definitely open in that area. Nothing a little clothing double sided tape can’t hide. It is something that I am used to being such a small breast size. The arm length is pretty short as well though my arms are long. I will have to scrunch it up to make it look okay. I am 5’6” and 108lbs. Typically a size 00 or 24 in jeans for reference

I originally ordered this dress in a small & it was very baggy everywhere so I returned & ordered an extra small. I’ve never been an XS! For reference I’m 113lbs & 5ft. I still had to get the back taken in & it was way too low cut for me so I had the front sewed up some. I bought it for family pics & I don’t want cleavage for that! But otherwise great material, it’s beautiful & flows & exactly like the picture & what I was looking for (with some alterations😉)
I loved this dress. However, it came with a horrible humidity odor and damp. The bag was not open or with any holes, so it came like that from the seller.

评论概述: Cute but maybe not for tall girlys
评论详情: This dress is super cute and decent quality! However, I’m 5’8” and the cheeks were almost out.

I didn't wear tape or a bra so I had to be very careful to not flash. I didn't have time for a new option. It is a good quality and thickness. I think I realized after the fact that it's not my style but it's a nice dress.
Loved the way this dressed looked on and the material is really nice.

类型: Size: X-LargeColor: S Print Rose Multicolored
评论详情: Love the material the design the colors! All were beautiful. I am 6 2 and a 16 for dresses. This has very little stretch and was very short! Main reason for return was length was just too short on me. Sleeves hit me mid fore arm.

This is a very cute dress! Unfortunately I am apple shaped and it fits everywhere except the waist, I can’t zip the zipper up and it’s fitted so there’s no way around it I’m going to have to return it. So this dress is not for anybody with a thick waist

类型: Size: XX-LargeColor: S New White Floral
评论详情: I really needed this dress as a last minute option for a baby shower and I'm so glad I stumbled upon it.  It was perfect. I'm always skeptical of fit when ordering online as a plus sized baddie but this was fit like it was made for me. It's not cheaply made like fast fashion dresses.  I got so many compliments while wearing. I wish I had somewhere else to wear it .
So pretty!! Muy bonito
This dress is beautiful!!! I’m 5’6 and about 130. I could wear either a S or M so it fits true to size. The back of the dress is what makes it over the top for me! I will be ordering another.

评论概述: Flowy and structured- shorter than expected.
评论详情: Love the fit! It has the right type of material to twirl like a princess. You would need a take under to make it less revealing if you are bustier like myself. It also is shorter that I expected. Nothing some shorts don't fix - but if you get this dress (totally worth it btw) you might want to think about what you put underneath. Great find!

类型: Size: LargeColor: S Print Rose Multicolored
评论详情: I love everything about this dress!  It’s lightweight, comfortable and flattering. I received a ton of compliments and everyone was shocked when I said I got it from Amazon!

评论概述: Super pretty but having more small options would help especially if you’re small chested.
评论详情: This dress is so pretty and as far as looks, the pictures are very accurate (I bought the light blue with sort of cheetah print like white dots and the white with the blue and orange). I got smalls and they fit great through the ribs and length but are loose in the armpit to mid boob so it’s kind of unflattering. I want to keep the blue really bad so I’m altering it lol - if you can’t fill it out it’s just not as pretty.  The main problem is the distance from the neck to the shoulder seam is too long - the shoulder/arm seam should be brought up higher.  Once we did that at the seamstress it brought the material right up against me nicely and didn’t pull the chest open at all. (:

评论概述: Cute and flattering- runs a little big
评论详情: Very cute! I bought for a wedding originally in a size medium. I’m a size 6 and tend to go for mediums in dresses as the safe option. But I ended up returning it for the small and it fit much better. For reference I am 5’11” and it wasn’t uncomfortably short. There is not any stretch in the waist so stepping into the dress even with the zipper all the way down takes a little wiggling. But once it’s on it’s a great fit. The top could accommodate a little more bust as I wore it without a bra and if I was sitting the neck could be a little loose. If I were wearing it again for a full day I would probably get a little double sided fabric tape to keep the edges down. If you’re considering it it’s worth a try girl! 😉
love this dress and the way it fit. Runs true to size but the material is thin and came with small holes on it and a tear in one of the seams.

类型: Size: SmallColor: S New White Floral
评论详情: This dress is really well made, flattering, and long enough on my 5’8” frame to be knee length and not at all scandalous. Perfect for: bridal shower, wedding guest, wine tasting, garden party. It does have a cut out back, clearly pictured, just something to consider for sun exposure and cooler temps. I can not wait to wear mine!
I’m 5’5 size Medium weight 150pounds the dress fit perfectly. Love the color and material.

I am in love with this dress.  I got it to go to Nashville.  My husband surprised me with a couples trip. When I ordered it said it wouldn't get here till Saturday. I had ordered it on a sunday.  I just happened to check up on the order and it was already here. Today is Wednesday.  I was so excited bc I leave Saturday and was afraid I wouldn't get it in time.  Its nice material. not see thru either.  When I pulled it out of the bag, I thought it might be.  I only gave it 4 starts because it is super short.  But I have a bit of a butt. I'll post a pic when I get a backless bra.I'm 5 '2' and 165 pounds for reference and I ordered the Lg.  If your on the fence, order it.  It's worth it.

It’s cute but the sleeves are too short and due to the elastic they kinda need to be pushed up unless you like that 3/4 sleeve look. It also had a lot of strings that needed trimming when purchased and came in a bag meaning lots of wrinkles.

评论概述: Beautiful dress! It looks better on me than in the picture.
类型: Size: LargeColor: S Print Rose Multicolored
评论详情: You will not be disappointed with this dress. The colors are vibrant, and the fit is very flattering. I am glad it is not too short, since I am not 25 anymore. I cannot wait to wear this to my event.

Legit as soon as I got home I tried it on and IMMEDIATELY I felt so fudging pretty!!!!!! I'm not one to dress up very often and this dress was perfect! Flowy and breezy, the fabric is light but not deathly see through. It literally screams Hallmark girly at a beach restaurant frfr. I love it so much!!!!

类型: Size: XX-LargeColor: S Print Rose Multicolored
评论详情: Iam going to wear this with leggings it is made well fits perfect and is very comfortable

Love the dress!! Super low cut. I couldn’t come up with something to add, to cut down on the cleavage showing. I’m 48. I’m a DDD, I couldn't see how I could have had this altered to make it work Love the color and style of the dress. If your young, and not too large of a chest, you might be able to roll with it. With they would add a little more fabric to that neck plundge. Super cute dress.

This is absolutely a beautiful dress! I’m in between a small and a medium, so I always have to kind of deal with clothes not fitting me perfectly. I definitely recommend using tape around the bust, as any time my body wasn’t completely erect, there would be too much cleavage seen. The open back was fun and sexy along with the deep neck. You definitely want to wear some sort of shorts underneath because it will definitely show off your lady bits. I would have to say that’s my only complaint is the length. For a short gal I have a booty, and I made the mistake of wearing this on a windy day. Now I know how Marilyn Monroe felt 😂 Regardless of the length, I will be ordering a couple more in different colors!

类型: Size: X-LargeColor: S Print Rose Multicolored
评论详情: Beautiful colors. I got tons of compliments at work. I ordered the large but it was just too tight. I’m 5’4 176 lbs. I had to send it back for the xl. Was thankful it came in time for my work function.

评论概述: Cute dress but easily able to rip
评论详情: I really love this dress super pretty when I bought it very nice material but then when I put it on for the first time to go to church yesterday, there is a rip at the bottom on the seam scared it might rip the rest of the dress not sure what to do it was kind of expensive so I’m a little disappointing on that part

I definitely carry the genes of someone whose European ancestors survived a famine or two. I have sort of wide shoulders and a wide rib cage, and my extra weight generally migrates to my chest, upper arms, and belly pooch. This dress is SO FLATTERING. My DDDs sit nicely and are reasonably supported (I could use tape but they  wouldn’t fall out or give off pancake vibes without it). The cut of the dress tucks in at the waist and then flares in a way that hides the Ben and Jerry’s you accidentally hit cardboard on last night without taking it so far that people ask “Awe! How far along are you?”. I would caution that if you are blessed with a deliciously bodacious booty the dress may end up being a little short in the back.

The dress itself is adorable - flirty, cute and fit as expected. The only downside is that the hem edges on the ruffles fray and fall apart because of the delicate fabric and there is no way to repair it.

The fit is amazing and looks so cute on but it definitely needs one more button at the bottom of the back buttons for it to stay closed. I know how to sew, so I was able to put it on easily but if I didn’t I would have definitely bothered me.

评论概述: Super cute, a bit short but still looks and feels beautiful.
评论详情: This dress is SOOOOOO FLATTERING!! my boobs look amazing, and it’s very flirty and feminine. It was a little too short for me (if I were ten years younger I wouldn’t even think twice about that lol)… I was going to return it but talked myself into using it for beach trips. I would buy 3 more of these in other colors if they were a bit longer. I purchased the XL and could have used a Large. I am 5’7” and my weight ranges from 180-190lbs (currently at the top of that) and there was still a lot of room in the waist and chest. The loose fit didn’t really take much away from the look but I do like things a little more fitted in the waist.

I love the color and it’s nice and lightweight. But as I was seeing how it looked on my, I saw that the draping is off on this dress. The right side of the dress is perfect, but you can see the other side drapes incorrectly because it has been sewn badly. You can see in the photo it puckers and doesn’t drape flat. The fabric has a bump so it loops cheap and sloppy. I’m sending it back.
This is a cute dress! Size was perfect and it’s made of nice material. Very flowy.

评论概述: Yeah, it is what you see.

评论详情: I would normally have gotten a large in a dress, but due to reviews I got a Medium.  I got this for my mom’s wedding coming up.  I feel like I look like a baby doll in the dress with all the ruffles. Not my style but I knew that when I purchased it. Unfortunately none of my dresses fit and my style would prob not be appropriate on my new weight gain.  I am currently measuring in at 38D, 31 waist, and I think 40 in hips.  155Lbs :( 5’4

类型: Size: X-SmallColor: S New Pink Floral 2
评论详情: Fit perfect! The sleeves are kind of tight around your wrists. I was worried the v neck would be too deep but it wasn’t. Love the pattern and the open back!

I absolutely love this dress! I would buy it in multiple colors if I had more occasions to wear it to!! It's so flattering on the arms, and I don't have a picture of the back but the open back is sexy. I have a large butt so usually I'm worried about dresses riding up- this dress has a slip and I wasn't too worried about it riding up. It's so cute and absolutely love it. The deep cut in the front of the dress means you should either opt for no bra, or nip covers- so make sure you have those!

I love the way that this dress looks and fits. It does show a little cleavage and is open in the back, so I was able to wear a normal bra with a bandeau on top to make it a little bit more modest when needed. Unfortunately, after only three wears, there is a large tear on the side. The fabric makes it hard to stitch (for an amateur like me at least.) I hand wash and hang fragile items like this one, but it unfortunately still did not handle well.

Bought an XL because these things always run small. The fabric and pattern is super pretty and cute, the colors are soft and light. The ruffles are cute and the neck is low cut but it isn't like I am going to pop a titty out. The back is open but it isn't bad enough to show off rolls or backfat or anything like that. With a tan and wedges I think this dress will be so cute, but it is SUPER short on, so it isn't a dress that I will be bending over in or going out in a windy climate with, not unless I want everyone to see my peach.

Initially I was shipped the incorrect item (received a Hawaiian tank top belly shirt), but Amazon immediately reshipped and delivered the correct item free of charge with no hassle as all! The color of this dress is absolutely gorgeous and the fit is perfect! It hides any insecurities one may have, but also form fitting giving you a classy/confident fit & feel. I have a smaller chest and the V neck doesn't show too much, but shows enough ;) The material is great quality as well. You can wear it in the midst of summer without becoming too hot or sweaty! I have two weddings this weekend and next and will be ordering another one in a different color to have one for each wedding. If you're looking for a casual or formal dress, this one is a great option!  Size: M Height: 5'8" Weight: 150 lbs Chest: B cup
very cute dress with many different color options, perfect for different seasons. there are a few strings that need to be cut, but other than that pretty good quality for the price.
Loved this for family pictures I got a medium. I  probably could have worn a small (I had like no boobs) so I had to safety pin the top but overall love it!!!

I love this dress I would give it a 8/10 just for the fact that the back is cut out so I am unsure of what kind of bra to wear with this.. I don’t find it flattering to see someone’s bra. So I chose not to wear a bra with it and man I was about to have a nip slip like no other.. going to try a Safeway pen to see if that will solve the problem.. wish it came with a clip to help cover the cleavage ..

评论概述: Cute Dress, but didn’t love it
评论详情: I just want to start out by saying there’s nothing wrong with the dress in terms of quality, or even style really. This is more of just a buyer beware if you tend to carry weight in your arms, this dress make your shoulder look very broad and isn’t all that flattering. I really wanted to love this dress because it looks great on so many body types and skin tones, but personally I really didn’t like the way the shoulders made me look boxy up top.
Nice fitting and really pretty. I bought this for my grandaughter,she loved it. Looks nice

It feels extremely thin and one of the straps broke when I applied the slightest bit of pull. It fits badly and isn't manufactured for women with busts. The picture was lovely so I was really disappointed when I tried it on.

It is a beautiful dress, but it wasn't the best fit for my body. I'm a plus sized girly but I'm also a member of the itty bitty committee, so it's a little too roomy up top for me. The print is to die for though, and I can easily get it altered.

评论概述: Not suitable for bigger chested girls

类型: Size: SmallColor: S Print Rose Multicolored
评论详情: This dress is absolutely gorgeous. The colors are vibrant. The fabric is light &  breathable. The length is perfect. The weight of the fabric is not too heavy for southern summer wear.

This took a month to arrive and the tracking system isn't the best, but the seller answers any questions you may have. The dress is super cute, but the material is thin. I ordered the green/sage color and I was disappointed to see that the inner lining was white instead of the sage color I saw in another review photo. The lining isn't such a big deal, but I think it would have made the dress look better. I'm pregnant and ordered my pre-pregnancy size (small). I wish I had sized up because my bump grew so much over the past month. I'm hoping to be able to use it after I give birth so I'll keep it. I can't say whether it is true to size or not, but if you're pregnant definitely size up bc it is not stretchy at all.

类型: Size: LargeColor: S New Pink Floral
评论详情: Super cute dress and very comfortable length was decent and material was nice for the weather true to size

评论概述: Could be better but still love it!
评论详情: Very cute dress but the top portion was a little bug on me for a large. The length was great as I am 5’7 but the top portion was slightly loose and I am usually a large and 36C. Plus the material was a bit thin but was not see through. I also noticed that some of the sewing was crooked and uneven so the bottom portion was at an angle. You wouldn’t be able to notice but I kinda inspected it to make sure.overall a cute dress!

类型: Size: XX-LargeColor: S New Khaki Floral
评论详情: Dress was short but the slip underneath was borderline not enough fabric. Very cute, you’ll need some help buttoning the top of the back. I didn’t wear a bra with this and felt fine with the support from the top. Good date night outfit

I wore this dress for my first set of senior pictures and it’s so pretty. I got so many compliments on this dress. I loved the open back on it the most. It’s very flowy, comfortable, and loose; perfect for the summer or spring. The sleeves on the dress are also sheer — you can kind of see that in the black & white picture! This dress is not see through nor is it itchy in any way. I would give the quality a 10/10.

This dress is so pretty…much better in person than in the Amazon photos! Thanks to all the previous buyers for posting! My one and only complaint, which may be the reason I return it, is there is absolutely NO give in the waist!! I’m pretty small and I’m even nervous about how tight it is. It zips from the back skirt part and then the top part is somewhat forgivable and giving around your shoulders. Other than that it is beautiful, flows as you walk, and perfect for summer! For reference: I’m 5’2”, normally wear a size 0-2 (bought a small). Hope that helps. I will add pictures, if I keep it.

类型: Size: LargeColor: S Print Red Floral
评论详情: I am in love with this dress. My body measurements are 46-38-47 and this dress fits a little snug,  but in all the right places. Given this dress had absolutely no stretch to it, it's so well made that my 42DD chest fit securely in place without needing a bra or feeling squished. It is shorter than I expected though
Love the dress! Light and flowy. Length is great. Wish they had solid color options to buy!
